ygData.msgSnippet: The Oblitercons/Dark Claw/Flesh Ripper/Demon Wulf/Sixshot/Ares/Serpentor/Unitron/Chaos/Minion Dark One raised his plasma rifle, firing off three plasma bolts

Subject: Re: War
To: nbwrpg@egroups.com
MIME-Version: 1.0
Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
X-Mailer: Unknown sub 103
From: KSLawdogg@...

The Oblitercons/Dark Claw/Flesh Ripper/Demon 
Wulf/Sixshot/Ares/Serpentor/Unitron/Chaos/Minion




Dark One raised his plasma rifle, firing off three plasma bolts at Stronghold.

---

Breakdown raised his grenade launcher, firing off a grenade set to explode on 
impact at the Mafia base.

---

Pyro raised his flame cannon, firing off three fireballs at Blender.

---

Hiss raised his fusion cannon, firing off three blasts at Doom Ice.

---

Scavenger took out his missile launcher, firing off a rocket at the Mafia 
base.

---

Demon Wulf growled in anger as Rizopas took the shots heroically.  Raising 
his sword, it fired a green bolt of energy out at Rizopas.

---

Flesh Ripper got up, firing off three optic blasts at the incoming missile.  
The resulting explosion forced him to grind his teeth as he was engulfed in 
flames.

---

Dark Claw claw fired another two missiles at the Mafia base.

---

Sixshot barrel rolled, the missile passing by.  He began turning around to 
make another pass.

---

Unitron barely felt the laser blast as it dug into his turret.  Transforming 
to robot mode, he raised both rifles.  He fired off three bolts of energy 
from each, six laser bolts heading out at Rizopas.  "We shall celebrate our 
victory when the river of mech-fluid from you and your companions flows at 
our feet!"

---

Serpentor fired off another plasma blast from his launcher, at the missiles.  
(Don't mean to post damage, just want to get this over quick).  One missile 
got through, exploding against his chest, sending him back several feet, 
slamming to the ground not moving.

---

Chaos, in his missile trailer mode, launched two missiles at the Mafia base.  
He only had several left.

---

Minion fired off five rapid optic blasts at Stronghold.
